reviewText:
She has designed some nice routines and her instructions are easy to follow. This is a great concept. I feel it's not for a beginner.

Unfortunately, the recording quality is not consistent on the disk I received. The microphone moved away from her mouth and it's difficult to hear the instruction/guidance without blaring my TV.
A great workout to help lengthen, tone and strengthen your total body. A real must have DVD! I'm a happy customer!!
First of all, I love the music. It has a beat to it and it makes the workout fun. Part II is my favorite. My core is always sore when I finish that one.

Piyolet is an excellent way to increase your flexibility and strengthen your core. It keeps me interested because it is such a new concept. I have developed long and lean muscle definition by using this product.
